content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### New Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore pump (position z)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Assembling machine at position (z1) and inserter at position (a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position (z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. You received errors indicating "Could not insert: No iron-ore to insert from your inventory".
- Be aware of the furnace status before inserting items. If the furnace result is full, it will not accept more items. You received warnings indicating "furnace result is full".

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Be aware of the furnace status before extracting items. If the furnace has no ingredients, it will not have any output. You received warnings indicating "no ingredients to smelt".

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it.
